import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './style.css'; const App = () => { const [loadingComplete, setLoadingComplete] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setLoadingComplete(true); }, 2000); // Set to 2 seconds for loading screen duration return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, []); return (
{!loadingComplete ? (
) : (
